select Area_code, area_name, weather_t_min, weather_t_max, weather_finedust_concentration, weather_ultrafinedust_concentration, weather_ozone_concentration from group_weather WHERE (SELECT t_group_addr FROM t_group WHERE t_group_id = #{t_group_id}) LIKE CONCAT('%',Area_Name,'%') order by Weather_Date desc limit 1

select ifnull(sensor_data_module_temp, "-") as sensor_data_module_temp, ifnull(sensor_data_ambient_temp,"-") as sensor_data_ambient_temp, ifnull(sensor_data_horizontal_idt, "-" ) as sensor_data_horizontal_idt, ifnull(sensor_data_slope_idt, "-") as sensor_data_slope_idt from sensor_data where t_group_id = #{t_group_id} order by sensor_data_date desc limit 1

select a.t_group_id, b.alarm_type, b.alarm_grade, b.alarm_status, b.IS_Clear, b.Alarm_Upt_Data from t_group as a inner join t_alarm as b on a.t_group_id = b.alarm_idx where a.t_group_id = #{t_group_id}
